thread.title: BRIEF-Summit Semiconductor Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $20 Million

title: BRIEF-Summit Semiconductor Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $20 Million
text:
April 13, 2018 / 3:56 PM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Summit Semiconductor Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $20 Million Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - Summit Semiconductor Inc: 
* SUMMIT SEMICONDUCTOR INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $20 MILLION – SEC FILING 
* SUMMIT SEMICONDUCTOR INC SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NASDAQ CAPITAL MARKET UNDER THE SYMBOL “WISA” 
* SUMMIT SEMICONDUCTOR INC SAYS ALEXANDER CAPITAL, L.P, WESTPARK CAPITAL, INC ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO 
* SUMMIT SEMICONDUCTOR INC SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text: ( bit.ly/2HApX4s )
